title: NFL Preseason Underway
description:
Week 1 of the NFL preseason is now through. Laura, Marcus, Mina, & Schefter take us through the headlines as we near week 1 of the regular season. QB competition was on full display in Pittsburgh and the the Patriots STILL don't have an offensive coordinator. Is our crew concerned with the Patriots offense? We got that covered.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
